11.description: Swap button single and double press functionality

13.description: Allow immediate action on single button press

0.description: Single, multi-press and hold button actions

1.description: Only single press action for immediate response

32.description: Number of 0.1 seconds to hold button before sending HOLD action message

40.description: Stop detecting any input change on the button GPIO [0.1s]

61.description: Force local operation when ButtonTopic or SwitchTopic is set
